About Me

A Few Things About Me...

Education

Graduated from DevMountain's Full Stack Web Developer Program.

Graduated from Provo College with Associates Degree in Computer Networking.

Military Background

Web Developer & Servered as the Help Desk

I was in charge of Building & Maintain the HR website for the Utah Army National Guard. I would interview Officers and Work on a Page Layout for their department, I would then build their Web Page. I also served as the helpdesk for the SIDPERS & PSB Departments. I was also in the Field Artillery. 13D Field Artillery Automated Tactical Data Systems Specialist & 13B Cannon Crew Member.

June 2004 - June 2010

Liquidation Team

Logistic Manager, Online Content Manager, Shipping Manager

I was originally hired as the shipping manager. I was then promoted to Online Content Manger, where I had a small team of employees that would post product online for sale. I was then promoted to Logitstics Manager, where I was overseeing our online content and our incoming freight and out going packages.

July 2011 - June 2019

DevMountain Bootcamp

Graduated From DevMountain Full Stack Web Developer

I went to DevMountain where I developed skills with JavaScript, React, Express, PostreSQL, Jest, HTML, CSS, Styled Components, Twilio, SASS, Jest, Version Control with Github, Heroku, & other technologies. I created a Personal Project, dog-cuts.com & worked with a great team of coworkers build a group app, head-games.org.

June 2019 - September 2019

Just Utah Coders

Web Developer

I am part of a non-profit company that builds large open-source apps that have a mission to help people in the Utah community. Apps are build with Javascript using the React library. We use NodeJS for the backend. I enjoy being part of a Team where I can Review code & have my code reviewed. We use Git for our version control.

October 2019 - Present
